title.en: The Aspiration of the Vajradhātu Maṇḍala

text.en: Buddhas and bodhisattva heirs of the ten directions and four times,
text.en-trans: chok chu dü zhii gyalwa sé dang ché

text.en: Gurus, devas, ḍākinīs and the hosts of dharmapālas who guard the teachings—
text.en-trans: lama yidam khandro chö kyong tsok

text.en: All of you without exception, as numerous as atoms in the universe, please come now
text.en-trans: malü zhing gi dul nyé shek su sol

text.en: Into the space before me, and take your seats on these cushions of lotus and moon.
text.en-trans: dün gyi namkhar pe dé den la zhuk

text.en: I pay homage with devotion in body, speech and mind.
text.en-trans: lü ngak yi sum güpé chaktsal lo

text.en: I present outer, inner and secret offerings and the gift of suchness.
text.en-trans: chi nang sangwa dézhin nyi kyi chö

text.en: In the presence of the supreme support, the sugatas,
text.en-trans: ten chok déshek nam kyi chen nga ru

text.en: I feel remorse for all my accumulated negative actions of the past,
text.en-trans: ngön gyi dikpe tsok la dak nong zhing

text.en: And with regret I confess my present non-virtues:
text.en-trans: daté migé gyöpé rap tu shak

text.en: From now on, I vow to turn away from them all.
text.en-trans: chinché dé lé dok chir dak gi dam

text.en: I rejoice in all accumulations of virtue and merit.
text.en-trans: sönam gé tsok kun la yirang ngo

text.en: I beseech all the victorious ones not to pass beyond sorrow,
text.en-trans: gyalwé tsok nam nyangen midawar

text.en: But to turn the wheel of the three piṭakas and of the unsurpassed Dharma.
text.en-trans: dénö sum dang lamé chö khor kor

text.en: I dedicate all accumulations of virtue, without exception, to the minds of beings:
text.en-trans: gé tsok malü drowé gyü la ngo

text.en: May they all reach the ground of unsurpassable liberation!
text.en-trans: dro nam lamé tarpé sar chin shok

text.en: Buddhas and your bodhisattva heirs, turn your attention towards me!
text.en-trans: sangyé sé ché dak la gong su sol

text.en: May this excellent aspiration that I am now making,
text.en-trans: dak gi tsampé mönlam rapzang di

text.en: Emulate the prayers
text.en-trans: gyalwa kuntuzang dang dé sé dang

text.en: Of the victorious Samantabhadra with his bodhisattva heirs,
text.en-trans: pakpa jampalyang kyi khyenpa tar

text.en: And noble Mañjughoṣa's omniscient wisdom.
text.en-trans: dédak kun gyi jésu dak lop shok

text.en: May the precious gurus, the glory of the teachings,
text.en-trans: tenpé palgyur lama rinchen nam

text.en: Pervade everywhere like space itself,
text.en-trans: namkha zhintu kun la khyapar shok

text.en: And illuminate everything like the sun and moon.
text.en-trans: nyi da zhintu kun la selwar shok

text.en: May they always be with us, steadfast like mountains.
text.en-trans: riwo zhintu taktu tenpar shok

text.en: May the precious saṅgha, the bedrock of the teachings,
text.en-trans: tenpé zhima gendun rinpoche

text.en: Remain in harmony, maintain pure discipline and be rich in the three higher trainings.
text.en-trans: tuk tün trim tsang lap sum gyi chuk shok

text.en: May the practitioners of the Secret Mantrayāna, the heart of the teachings,
text.en-trans: tenpé nyingpo sang ngak drubpé dé

text.en: Keep their samaya commitments and perfect the generation and completion stages.
text.en-trans: damtsik den zhing kyé dzok tarchin shok

text.en: For the king who protects the Dharma, the benefactor of the teachings,
text.en-trans: tenpé jindak chökyong gyalpo yang

text.en: May his kingdom flourish and may he be of benefit to the Dharma.
text.en-trans: chapsi gyé shing ten la menpar shok

text.en: May those who serve the teachings, warriors and ministers,
text.en-trans: tenpé zhap dek gyal rik lönpo yang

text.en: Possess increasing skills and supreme intelligence.
text.en-trans: lodrö rap pel tsal dang denpar shok

text.en: May the wealthy householders who sustain the teachings
text.en-trans: tenpé söjé khyimdak jorden nam

text.en: Be prosperous and always free from harm.
text.en-trans: longchö den zhing nyertsé mépar shok

text.en: May all Buddhist nations where there is faith in the teachings
text.en-trans: tenpa dépé yangpé gyalkham kun

text.en: Enjoy happiness and well-being, with all obstacles pacified.
text.en-trans: dékyi den zhing barché zhiwar shok

text.en: And for me, this yogi on the path,
text.en-trans: lam la népé naljor daknyi kyang

text.en: May my samaya never decline and my wishes be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: damtsik minyam sampa drubpar shok

text.en: May whoever makes a connection with me, through positive or negative karma,
text.en-trans: dak la zang ngen lé kyi drel gyur gang

text.en: Always be blessed by the buddhas' care,
text.en-trans: nékap tartuk gyalwé jédzin shok

text.en: And may all beings cross the gate of the supreme vehicle,
text.en-trans: dronam lamé tekpé gor zhuk né

text.en: And reach Samantabhadra's great kingdom.
text.en-trans: kunzang gyalsi chenpo tobpar shok
